sentences.en: "Yes," he muttered, his voice so muted I hardly heard his reply.
sentences.cn: 他小声说：“是。”声音低得我几乎听不到。

sentences.en: At first the wooded hillsides muted the sounds.
sentences.cn: 最初长满树木的山坡吸收了噪音。

sentences.en: But the league table dictates they are muted celebrations.
sentences.cn: 但联赛积分榜却让他们高兴不起来.

sentences.en: Everyone was sitting round discussing the accident in muted voices.
sentences.cn: 大家围坐在一起压低声音讨论着这次事故。

sentences.en: He likes sombre, muted colours — she likes bright colours.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢暗淡、柔和的颜色；而她喜欢明艳的颜色。

sentences.en: In high - speed driving, the muted effects of this engine satisfactory.
sentences.cn: 在高速行驶中, 这款发动机的静音效果让人满意.

sentences.en: Spring sees a return to whites, browns and other muted tones.
sentences.cn: 白色系 、 棕色系以及其它柔化色系将在春季回归.
那画家把色彩抹得柔和些.

sentences.en: The house seemed muted, hushed as if it had been deserted.
sentences.cn: 房子里似乎悄然无声，安静得好像已经没人在住一样。

sentences.en: The lightning moved south followed by a few claps of muted thunder.
sentences.cn: 闪都到南边去,曳着几声不甚响亮的雷.

sentences.en: The strings are muted throughout the closing bars of the symphony.
sentences.cn: 该交响曲结束部分各节中的弦乐全为弱化音.

sentences.en: The walls were painted in muted tones to show the pictures to good advantage.
sentences.cn: 墙面被漆成了淡色调，以突出照片。

sentences.en: There were muted cheers from the public gallery.
sentences.cn: 旁听席传出了轻微的欢呼声。

sentences.en: Try to take off all of pressure until the string sounds muted.
sentences.cn: 尽量减小按弦的力度值得琴弦发出哑音.

sentences.en: Why have the Chinese shifted from strident opposition to muted acquiescence?
sentences.cn: 为什么中国突然转变了态度,变得沉默或者说使默许了 呢 ?

trans.tran_cn: （声音）减弱的，变得轻柔的； （尤指感情的表达）缓和的，温和的
trans.tran_en: muted sounds, voices etc are quieter than usual
